name: Disaster Incoming
description:
Disaster preparedness educational game.

This project was implemented in the scope of ENV 210 Disasters course and is still in progress. The aim of the game is to spread awareness regarding disaster preparedness (in particular, earthquakes). The game consists of two parts: building an emergency kit and surviving a disaster.  More disasters will be added in future. All responses are collected for future analysis.

Engine - Unity 3D
Art and sprites - Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop
Music - https://stevenobriencomposer.bandcamp.com/ used under creative commons
Source - Official website of the Department of Homeland Security
